title: ILIFE VAC
description:
The ILIFE VAC APP allows you to remotely control the sweeping robot through your mobile phone. Whether at home or outside, you can let the robot perform daily cleaning tasks independently.All you need to do is appreciate its efficient cleaning function and enjoy a warm and clean home environment.

1)View the real-time map, the robot builds the map in real time during the cleaning, allowing you to see its work at a glance.

2)Remote cleaning, simple operation can remotely control all the functions of the machine, cleaning anytime, anywhere.

3)Make an appointment for cleaning and set the time for daily cleaning work to meet your exclusive cleaning customization.

4)Support multiple cleaning modes to switch easily.
